page.title: 20Ryhope Churches
page.content:
{ St. Cuthbert's}is built on the site of an earlier Methodist chapel. The {Independent Methodists}have their own chapel which was built in 1965. { St.Patrick's}was built in 1915 to accommodate the growing numbers of Roman Catholics. The school was built in 1926. The present parish priest is the Rev. W. Elkin. Although there are a number of Christian churches in Ryhope it could not be said that the majority of people attend a church. It appears that many people do not find any need for organised religion today.
-------------------------------------- { The information for these text {pages was gathered and written by {children from Ryhope Junior School and {St.Patrick's R.C. Primary School, {Ryhope, Sunderland. }
